title: Comprehensive update.json merge tests
description:
Add tests for the update.json hot-reload merge functionality. Given the bugs encountered (jq parse errors, empty strings in arrays, corrupt index.json state), we need comprehensive test coverage.

Reference: _ralph_apply_update_queue() in ralph.zsh lines 3002-3090

acceptanceCriteria.text: === NEW STORY TESTS ===
Test: newStories creates story file in stories/ dir
Test: newStories adds story ID to pending array (no duplicates)
Test: newStories adds story ID to storyOrder array (no duplicates)
Test: Multiple newStories in one update.json all processed
=== UPDATE STORY TESTS ===
Test: updateStories merges changes into existing story file
Test: updateStories preserves unmodified fields
Test: updateStories skips non-existent story IDs gracefully
=== STATS RECALCULATION TESTS ===
Test: Stats total count updated after newStories
Test: Stats pending count matches pending array length
Test: Stats blocked count preserved
=== ERROR HANDLING TESTS ===
Test: Malformed JSON in update.json handled gracefully
Test: Empty update.json (no newStories/updateStories) is a no-op
Test: Missing index.json returns error code 1
=== CLEANUP TESTS ===
Test: update.json deleted after successful merge
Test: update.json preserved if merge fails
=== IGNORED FIELDS WARNING ===
Test: Warning printed for ignored fields (storyOrder, pending, stats)
=== INTEGRATION ===
All tests added to tests/test-ralph.zsh
Test count increased (currently 59 tests)
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
